t = int(input())
M = 1000000007
mul = [1]
for i in range(4 * 100000):
    mul.append(mul[-1] * 101 % M)
while t:
    t -= 1
    a = input()
    n = len(a)
    a += a
    pre = [0]
    for i in range(1, 2 * n + 1):
        pre.append((pre[-1] + ord(a[i - 1]) * mul[i - 1] % M) % M)
    suf = [0]
    for i in range(2 * n, 0, -1):
        suf.append((suf[-1] + ord(a[i - 1]) * mul[2 * n - i] % M) % M)
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if (pre[n + i] - pre[i] + M) % M * mul[n - i] % M == (suf[2 * n - i] - suf[n - i] + M) % M * mul[i] % M:
            ans += 1
    print(ans)

m = 1000000007
t = int(input())
p2 = []
p2.append(1)
for i in range(400000):
    p2.append(p2[i] * 31 % m)
for h in range(t):
    s = input()
    n = len(s)
    s2 = s[::-1]
    hash1 = 0
    hash2 = 0
    for i in range(n):
        hash1 += p2[i] * (ord(s[i]) - ord('a'))
        hash1 %= m
        hash2 += p2[i] * (ord(s2[i]) - ord('a'))
        hash2 %= m
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        hash1 -= p2[i] * (ord(s[i]) - ord('a'))
        hash1 += p2[i + n] * (ord(s[i]) - ord('a'))
        hash1 %= m
        if hash1 < 0:
            hash1 += m
        hash2 *= p2[2]
        hash2 %= m
        hash2 -= p2[n + 1 + i] * (ord(s2[n - 1 - i]) - ord('a'))
        hash2 += p2[i + 1] * (ord(s2[n - 1 - i]) - ord('a'))
        hash2 %= m
        if hash2 < 0:
            hash2 += m
        if hash1 == hash2:
            ans += 1
    print(ans)
